column4: When I click shutdown, ubuntu unloads but after its done it, it goes back to my bios, grub loads, and ubuntu comes back on.
Can somebody help me please? I have two problems which I've asked about multiple times with no responses
it's your BIOS. I've had this with Windows systems as well. check the acpi section. IIRC, I fixed it by setting the Power Off option to "Off" instead of "Last State"
mentioned it before, maybe you missed it... check the BIOS ACPI setting for behavior after power failure. Set it to "Off"
